thag4.8:5.2: because I’m accomplished in both ways:
thag4.8:5.3: I am the son of the Buddha,
thag4.8:5.4: and I have the vision of the teachings.
thag4.8:6.2: since there are no more future lives—
thag4.8:6.4: master of the three knowledges, seer of the deathless.
thag4.8:7.1: Blinded by sensual pleasures, trapped in a net,
thag4.8:7.2: they are smothered over by craving;
thag4.8:7.3: bound by the Kinsman of the Negligent,
thag4.8:7.4: like a fish caught in a funnel-net trap.
thag4.8:8.1: Having thrown off those sensual pleasures,
thag4.8:8.3: and having plucked out craving, root and all:
